00010         class LicenseEmail extends Email
00011         {
00012                 const default_subject = 'Messaggio dal sito Emeraldion.it da parte di ';
00013

00019                 
00024                 public $software;

00031                 public function LicenseEmail($params)
00032                 {
00033                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00034                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00035                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00036                                 $params['subject'] : (self::default_subject . $params['name']);
00037                         $this->recipient = self::default_recipient;
00038                         $this->headers = "From: {$params['name']}<{$params['email']}>";
00039                         if (!empty($params['text']))
00040                         {
00041                                 $this->text = get_magic_quotes_gpc() ? stripslashes($params['text']) : $params['text'];
00042                         }
00043                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00044                 }
00045                 
00050                 public function make_text()
00051                 {
00052                         $activation_url = $this->license->activation_url();

00054 
00055 Thank you for registering {$this->software->title}!
00056 
00057 Your registration codes:
00058 
00059 Name:
00060 {$this->license->username}
00061 Registration Key:
00062 {$this->license->key}
00063 
00064 To activate the application, show the registration sheet clicking on the
00065 "Registration..." menu item under the "{$this->software->title}" menu,
00066 then enter your registration codes.
00067 
00068 Or, you can simply click on the following link:
00069 <{$activation_url}>
00070 
00071 As a registered user you will receive periodic updates on software releases.
00072 If you do not want to receive further mailings, just reply to this email.
00073 
00074 For any question, feedback or feature request, feel free to use this email address.
00075 
00076 Best regards,
00077

00079 Emeraldion Lodge
00080 http://www.emeraldion.it
